title: Lagging out and ping spikes
body: I've been having connection problems all day on the NA servers.  Constant ping spikes of over 5000 ms and "Attempting to reconnect" every ten seconds.  It was so bad in my last game that I couldn't even CS properly.  I had to disconnect because I just do not have the superhuman patience required for this.  And the real kicker is that it was a top-lane between Volibear and Shaco.  SHACO TOP LANE.  I would have easily won that lane and most likely won the game if I could stop disconnecting for all of half a second, but that just isn't happening.  And it's not my connection - I've done ping-tests repeatedly and none of them are showing any of the jitter or connection problems I'm getting.

replies.body: Lag spikes and input delays are usually due problems with your network maintaining a connection to the game server.  I know you feel that might be the case, so I recommend running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which will get an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also provide a series of steps to get you squared away.  Let me know what you find!
